name: Anjos do Duelo
description:
Description:
Embark on this mystical adventure where several warriors fight against evil. In this story you will find fairies, dragons, angels and much more.
more. Help us face the monsters that appear along the way in the skin of Kura, Miguel and Skilla, each with battles and missions
different, can you save heaven and earth from the clutches of enemies?
The girl with a lot of stacks will enter the series,
Her name is Skilla!
You will fight enemies through 2D rpgs battles
You can equip items, buy things in the shop
The attributes are Life, Magic and Faith
The game contains dialogues in Brazilian Portuguese and sounds of the characters in English.
Works with mouse, keys and controller.
